ai-iti61:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti61:2.3_0: the eye of the flesh, the eye of clairvoyance, and the eye of wisdom.
ai-iti61:2.5_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti61:3.1_0: “The eye of flesh, the clairvoyant eye,
ai-iti61:4.1_0: The arising of the eye of flesh
ai-iti61:5.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
